resources.string: Reviews are public and include your account info. Privacy Policy

Afri-AppStore is managed and owned by Socialize Platforms Inc. Our AppStore features Apps developed by different developers and we are proud to present a platform that allows developers display their hardwork. Apps featured on our AppStore include but not limited to the following categories Entertainment, Education, Social Media, Ecomerce, Gaming, Just to mention a few among others!\nIn order to contact us for any communications, please get to us through info@afriappstore.com
